SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Install the Required Einstein Personalization Calculated Insights

To view the pipeline DMO metrics using the Personalization Intelligence app, you must install the required calculated insights from the Einstein Personalization data kit.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To install calculated insights:	Data Cloud Admin
In Data Cloud, on the Calculated Insights tab, click New.
From the Data Space dropdown, select the data space that you want to add the calculated insights to.
This data space must be the same as the one containing your personalization data.
Select Create from a Data Kit, and click Next.
Under Ready to Publish, select the Daily Personalization Requests calculated insight for the Personalization Intelligence app, and click Next.
Verify the calculated insight’s details and corresponding SQL code using Required Personalization Intelligence Calculated Insights, and click Activate.
(Optional) Define a schedule for processing and updating the calculated insight.
A frequency of every 24 hours is recommended.
Click Enable.
Repeat these steps for the Daily Personalization Uniques calculated insight.
